definitions.definition: A molecule or moiety ( ion , functional group , or radical ) that binds to another chemical entity to form a larger complex ; as, especially:

subdefinitions.definition: Such an entity that binds to a central metal atom to form a coordination complex .
Such an entity that forms a complex with a biomolecule to serve a biological purpose.

definitions.label_groups: inorganic chemistry , organic chemistry , physical chemistry

definitions.definition: A letter that orthography requires or allows to be ligated with one or more other letters to form a ligature , such as a in æ or o in œ .

secondary_definitions: ( typography ) A letter that orthography requires or allows to be ligated with one or more other letters to form a ligature , such as a in æ or o in œ .
